name: UITextInputTraits
desc: A set of methods that defines features for keyboard input to a text object.

items.name: var keyboardType: UIKeyboardType
items.desc: The keyboard type for the text object.

items.name: enum UIKeyboardType
items.desc: Constants that specify the type of keyboard to display for a text-based view.

items.name: var keyboardAppearance: UIKeyboardAppearance
items.desc: The appearance style of the keyboard for the text object.

items.name: enum UIKeyboardAppearance
items.desc: Constants that specify the appearance of the keyboard for a text-based view.

items.name: var returnKeyType: UIReturnKeyType
items.desc: The visible title of the Return key.

items.name: enum UIReturnKeyType
items.desc: Constants that specify the text string that displays in the Return key of a keyboard.

items.name: var textContentType: UITextContentType!
items.desc: The semantic meaning for a text input area.

items.name: struct UITextContentType
items.desc: Constants that identify the semantic meaning for a text-entry area.

items.name: var isSecureTextEntry: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the text object disables text copying and, in some cases, hides the text that the user enters.

items.name: var enablesReturnKeyAutomatically: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system automatically enables the Return key when the user is enters text.

items.name: var autocapitalizationType: UITextAutocapitalizationType
items.desc: The autocapitalization style for the text object.

items.name: enum UITextAutocapitalizationType
items.desc: The autocapitalization behavior of a text-based view.

items.name: var autocorrectionType: UITextAutocorrectionType
items.desc: The autocorrection style for the text object.

items.name: enum UITextAutocorrectionType
items.desc: The autocorrection behavior of a text-based view.

items.name: var spellCheckingType: UITextSpellCheckingType
items.desc: The spell-checking style for the text object.

items.name: enum UITextSpellCheckingType
items.desc: The spell-checking behavior of a text-based view.

items.name: var smartQuotesType: UITextSmartQuotesType
items.desc: The configuration state for smart quotes.

items.name: enum UITextSmartQuotesType
items.desc: Constants that indicate whether to enable or disable smart quotes.

items.name: var smartDashesType: UITextSmartDashesType
items.desc: The configuration state for smart dashes.

items.name: enum UITextSmartDashesType
items.desc: Constants that specify the automatic conversion behavior between hyphens and en or em dashes.

items.name: var smartInsertDeleteType: UITextSmartInsertDeleteType
items.desc: The configuration state for the smart insertion and deletion of space characters.

items.name: enum UITextSmartInsertDeleteType
items.desc: Constants that specify whether to automatically insert extra spaces after a paste operation or to delete them after a cut or delete operation.
